snippet.title: Title: Reconstruction of non-classical cavity field states with snapshots of their decoherence
snippet.description:
Title: Reconstruction of non-classical cavity field states with snapshots of their decoherence
Authors: Samuel Deleglise, Igor Dotsenko, Clement Sayrin, Julien Bernu, Michel Brune, Jean-Michel Raimond, Serge Haroche
Comments: 4 pages, 4 figures
Journal-ref: Nature 455, pp. 510-514 (25 September 2008)
Subjects: Quantum Physics (quant-ph)
